fields.fieldText: You are try to debit the Amount. Your Booking stage is not in Terminated stage or Cancel Reason is not set as Terminated or Cancelled.

value.stringValue: Existing payment records with same payment category & Cheque/ Transaction/ Challan Number

fields.fieldText: Please fill the Narration Statement for "{!Payment_Category}" first at the Project: "{!Get_Booking_Record.Project_Name__r.Name}" to proceed with adding the payment.

fields.fieldText: TDS payment cannot be created from SFDC. It will be sent through SAP.
